attributes.additional_details: The government don't always see what kids see as their mind is all built for adult issues. Whilst kids think about things that perhaps the government aren't interested in. Why they are not interested is another question? Sign the petition to help you. Think about it. Who wants to put that their kid was part of the kids' government? Who wants to be remembered for changing something for the good but aren't old enough? Sign it and make a change!
